table_of_contents.title: Tractatus: Super constitutione Ad reprimendum; Minoricarum (liber I-IV); De duobus fratribus; De tyrannia; Represaliarum; De insigniis et armis; De alimentis; Inter demonem et Virginem Mariam; Bannitorum; De citatione; De falcone; Copulae et coniunctionis; Dictionum; De fluminibus  seu Tiberiadis (De alluuione); De insula; De alueo; De iurisdictione; Casus in quibus citatio non valet; Ritus iudiciorum; De arbitris; Differentiae inter ius canonicum et ciuile; De Gelphis et Gebellinis; De regimine ciuitatis; De presumptionibus; De carceribus; De percussionibus; Ordo iudicii; Qualiter probetur mors; De successionibus ab intestato (secundum dominum Dynum); Tractatus testimoniorum (incl. sections by Jacobus Egidii and by Nellus de Sancto Geminiano).

notes.value:
Goff B-213
Hain-Copinger 2657
GW 3544
IGI 1322
Pazzaglini & Hawks.  Consilia, B-15
Caption of the first pt. (Consilia) says: "... cum aliquibus apostillis ... Bernardini de Landriano Mediolanensis." The whole apparently edited by him.
Title (leaf [1]a) printed in red.
Main text in two columns (71 lines).
Imprint from colophon, leaf 153a (there also woodcut device of Battista Torti).
Signatures: a-s⁸ t⁶ v⁴ (v4 blank).
The 39 woodcuts on leaves 106b-110b and 113a-116b in the treatises De fluminibus and De insula, are graphic aids, accompanied by explanatory text, to (alluvial, etc.) land surveying done for legal purposes.
With (preceded by): Crispo de' Monti, Giovanni. Termini omnium actionum, cum arbore. Venetijs : Per Joannem Haman d' Landoia, 1490.
